about_the_game:
Soundtrack sales are completely donated to organisations which protect and restore nature and environment.

Check this link to see where the money goes in our yearly Impact Reports.


Dive into the worlds of Imagine Earth with the game's soundtrack composed by Zevik Perry, Tilo Alpermann, Philipp Preuss and Stefan Ewald. All 14 tracks were mastered and mixed for the digital version of the album and are available in the following file formats: .MP3 at 320 kbps, .WAV, .FLAC.

Zevik Perry is a composer and sound designer. His projects include Spirit Oath and Destiny 2.

Tilo Alpermann is also a longtime composer and sound designer, producing both digitally and with live orchestras. His projects include indie titles as well as AAA productions such as The Lord of the Rings: Gollum and The Pillars of the Earth.

All soundtrack sales are donated to a project for forest conservation and reforstation. See Green Planet Bundle description or this post for more information.
